item.title: Read-Me
item.content:encoded:
slug: introduction title: Blog Introduction authors: [Mimi] tags: [Hello, world! Welcome!]

Welcome! Today is a great day. Please read this blog. It will be helpful.

Hi! I am Jiaming Xue. You can also call me Mimi.

I am a cross-broader.

I explore in many areas: Political Economy, Public Policy, AI Education, AI Ethics, Philosophy, Finance, Statistics, Sociology, and so on.

I also have many identities. You can have a guess.

Here is my blog. In this part, you can see what I am doing/ thinking/ concering/ passionate about......

I will also share some products and small innovations I have done. If you want to join in my projects/ have a chat with me/ cooperate with me/ other interesting things you want to do, please feel free to contact me.

Here is my email: Jiaming.Xue2025@outlook.com

item.title: Mini-Cloud
item.content:encoded:
Product Introduction​

Mini Cloud CalorieScan is an innovative intelligent diet assistant that uses AI image recognition technology to automatically analyze the calories and nutrients in daily diets. Users simply need to say "take a photo", and they can obtain a clear calorie report, making health management as effortless as a journey in the cloud. We named it "Mini Cloud" because we hope it can help every user relieve the burden of record-keeping and make every day's dietary choices light, simple, and free.

Product video​
